name: bedrock-vscode-chat
displayName: AWS Bedrock Provider for GitHub Copilot Chat
description: Native AWS Bedrock integration for GitHub Copilot Chat. Brings Claude, Llama, and Mistral models into your editor with streaming, function calling, and vision support across 14 regions.

languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.region.description: AWS region for Bedrock services (e.g., us-east-1, eu-west-1)
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.region.title: AWS Region

enumDescriptions: Use an AWS Bedrock API Key (Bearer Token)
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.authMe.title: Authentication Method

languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.apiKey.description: AWS Bedrock API Key (Bearer Token) - starts with 'bedrock-api-key-'. Can be long-term (1-365 days) or short-term (up to 12 hours). Only used when authMethod is 'api-key'.
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.apiKey.title: Bedrock API Key

languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.profil.description: AWS profile name from ~/.aws/credentials (only used when authMethod is 'profile')
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.profil.title: AWS Profile

languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.access.description: AWS Access Key ID (only used when authMethod is 'access-keys')
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.access.title: Access Key ID

languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.secret.description: AWS Secret Access Key (only used when authMethod is 'access-keys')
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.secret.title: Secret Access Key

languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.sessio.description: AWS Session Token for temporary credentials (optional)
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.sessio.title: Session Token

languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.thinki.description: Enable extended thinking for Claude 3.7 Sonnet and Claude 4 models (shows model's reasoning process)
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.thinki.title: Enable Extended Thinking

languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.thinki.description: Maximum number of tokens allocated for thinking process (minimum: 1024, recommended: 1024-10000)
languageModelChatProvider.bedrock.thinki.title: Thinking Budget Tokens
